entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0004.9286] [Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash, and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease), Excluding Exchange Rate Effect] with a value of 460,000 is not equal to the combined total of [Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities], [Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities] and [Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities] ( 10,327,000 + 20,920,000 + 11,053,000 ) with a value of 42,300,000.
These values should be equal. The properties of this us-gaap:CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRestrictedCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecreaseExcludingExchangeRateEffect fact are: Period :2024-01-01 to 2024-06-30 Dimensions : Unit : USD Decimals of [Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash, and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease), Excluding Exchange Rate Effect] : -3 Decimals of [Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities] : -3 Decimals of [Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities] : -3 Decimals of [Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities] : -3
Rule Element Id:9286 Rule version: 26.0.9 - pebk_10q.htm 2
